channel.title: PvP Plugin
channel.description:
http://forum.hey0.net/showthread.php?tid=2849
To me, it looks perfect.
Read it and post your opinions.

item.title: PvP Plugin
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:44, topic:377923”]If you don’t want to be frequently griefed and killed, move as far away from the spawn as you feel comfortable. Also in my opinion if you move to a city in the hope of being safe and being grief-free, i’d think like-wise as they are a huge attraction for griefers I would imagine. The only reason why I would want to live in a city is for the social interaction aspects of the game.

Just my thoughts.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: PvP Plugin
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:44, topic:377923”]If you don’t want to be frequently griefed and killed, move as far away from the spawn as you feel comfortable. Also in my opinion if you move to a city in the hope of being safe and being grief-free, i’d think like-wise as they are a huge attraction for griefers I would imagine. The only reason why I would want to live in a city is for the social interaction aspects of the game.

Just my thoughts.[/quote]

This. I am highly attracted to the idea of going to varrock and killing it’s residence.

Read full topic

item.title: PvP Plugin
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

If you don’t want to be frequently griefed and killed, move as far away from the spawn as you feel comfortable. Also in my opinion if you move to a city in the hope of being safe and being grief-free, i’d think like-wise as they are a huge attraction for griefers I would imagine. The only reason why I would want to live in a city is for the social interaction aspects of the game.

Just my thoughts.

item.title: PvP Plugin
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

casey.:

It’s fun the way it is…I don’t see why everyone crys.

thank you. that’s why I want to change my vote to “I love PvP!”
Although the new plugin MiTB posted might be a good add-on for PvP

Read full topic

item.title: PvP Plugin
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:34, topic:377923”]What about this plugin:

war.tommytony.com

War - Minecraft PVP Arenas (TDM, CTF & more!)

Home of the War plugin for the Bukkit Minecraft server mod.

Kind of reminds me of a combination of quake 3 or unreal tournament and minecraft. Pretty neat. :)[/quote]
Holy, this looks awesome!

Read full topic

item.title: PvP Plugin
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:32, topic:377923”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=473805.msg3465547#msg3465547 date=1294865749]
Just make an arena where we can kill each other for fun there I’ll build it if you want
[/quote]ill help[/quote]
I’ll help too; An arena made out of sand… lol

EDIT: btw, I love that!
I also have a new opinion about PvP now… PvP is actually a fun part of the game albeit a bit dangerous with lag issues and stuff, but yeah We can deal with that. If you make spawn a safe zone though, I’ll be 100% happy

Read full topic

item.title: PvP Plugin
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:29, topic:377923”]I’m not giving VIPs any special powers.

But yea, if the PvP opinions thread has a clear outcome that we don’t want it anymore, we may enable this plugin instead of fully removing it.[/quote]More people dislike PvP than those who do. I also hear way more complaints about PvP than I did when the server didn’t have it.

Read full topic

item.title: PvP Plugin
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I’m not giving VIPs any special powers.

But yea, if the PvP opinions thread has a clear outcome that we don’t want it anymore, we may enable this plugin instead of fully removing it.

item.title: PvP Plugin
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:10, topic:377923”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=473805.msg3464523#msg3464523 date=1294791096]
Still can’t kill a griefer or someone you don’t want in your home. I’d rather the spawn point just be a safe zone and call it a day.
[/quote]

Also let VIP+ make their home safe zone[/quote]

Three block thick obsidian walls and floor, and a series of 3 iron doors on top of obsidian that you must go through.

Read full topic

item.title: PvP Plugin
item.dc:creator: @Jammydee Jammydee
item.description:
@Jammydee wrote:

This plugin looks like a great idea if you’re not going to actaully disable PVP, because a lot of the people that play quite a lot don’t like it other than protecting their home…

I don’t really like pvp because i accidently attack people quite a lot because of lagg etc… :\

Read full topic

item.title: PvP Plugin
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:23, topic:377923”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=473805.msg3464588#msg3464588 date=1294793955]

Mainly reyx

I said you have the right to die, and that VIP shouldn’t give any privileges but the prestige of a green name.

[/quote]

Generally PVP is ruining the server. Just like it did runescape. With everyone calling people faggots and noobs etc.[/quote]At least RS you can only pk in certain area. And plus RS pking is fun. This is hold down mouse button move close to guy. “Oooh” “Oooh” “Oooh” dead.

Read full topic
